name: Bring Your Wedge
description:
Golf is all about timing right?

So bring your wedge and swing it with the arrow keys.

I recommend the fullscreen mode to ensure that the game is in focus

Left=Backswing
Down=Impact
Right=Follow through

  • Adjust your tempo to hit the green.
  • You get 10 balls but every Hole In One will give you an extra ball.

Please post your best scores if you like :-)
I made this in Pico 8 for the #Lowrezjam

Best regards!
Michael
